properties.neighborhood_overview: Tsim Sha Tsui is the city’s most exciting area, with top notch museums such as The Science Museum and Art Museum clustered around the waterfront. Nathan Road, Chungking Mansions and the Avenue of Stars, the latter boasting the best views in town. Although the apartment is in a vibrant area, the apartment itself is very quite a night. Its a perfect escape after a long day out and about. There are over 2,500 restaurants in the area which cater to every taste, from traditional Chinese Dim Sum, hawker style stall foods to exceptional French cuisine within 5 star hotels. Supermarkets and 24/7 convenience stores are just down the road, which can provide you all of your daily necessities any time day or night.
properties.notes: * You can send us your travel plans and we can let you know what kind of transportation is most convenient and which is the quickest way, and directions  For your convenience we could help you pre-arrange at your cost: Arrange airport pick-up from airport (400/trip)  Arrange car transport for your sightseeing (upon request, calculated by day)  Arrange pre-paid phone card (100/week)  Arrange pre-paid WIFI for phone (75/week)  Arrange theme park tickets, Disney 475, Ocean Park 325, Children price will be different. Arrange different tickets, just let us know what you need. Arrange Octopus card for transportation (Deposit 50)  * Please voice out in advance if you need any of the above services
properties.transit: Basically right downstairs and within 250metres, you get access to any form of transport you can think of to your sightseeing locations in Hong Kong. - Airport Express - 7 minute Taxi,  - 45 minutes to airport by Bus A21 (HK33),  - 30 minutes to Disneyland by MTR.  - 10 minutes Admiralty bus to Ocean Park by MTR.  - 10 minutes walk to Harbour City, Tsim Sha Tsui (luxury brand-name stores).  - 6 minutes walk to Avenue of Stars, (overlooking the Hong Kong Island, Victoria).  - 10 minutes to Lan Kwai Fong, Central, by MTR.  - 8 minute MTR to Electronic products (Sai Yeung Choi Street).  - 8 minute MTR to Shoes Street (Fa Yuen Street).  - 8 minute MTR to Langham Place.  - 8 minutes MTR to Prince Edward (Flower Market, Birds Street, Goldfish Market and outdoor markets.)
properties.access: Electronic lock system with passcode, no check in or check out issues.  Full 2.5 & 5hz WIFI internet, full kitchen, showers & toilets.
properties.house_rules: Absolutely no smoking within the apartment. As much as I love animals, it would be a courtesy to my other guests that no pets are allowed.
properties.host_about:
Loves to travel and see the world.  Over recent years, I've travelled to London, Amsterdam, Paris, LA, San Francisco, Taiwan, Shanghai, Beijing, Australia, India, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, and Korea.  However, there is no place like home.

That is why I want to be a great host and make you feel right at home in my apartments in Hong Kong.  Welcome fellow travellers.
properties.street: Hankow Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

By Taxi from anywhere, tell the driver Comfort Building, Tsim Sha Tsui, you can alight right outside our apartment building!
properties.house_rules: Non-smoking rooms No Pets allowed
properties.host_about:
Hi everyone!

My name is Mike and I am an expatriate living in Hong Kong. I am a fun loving and easy going person who loves to read, play badminton and travel. I have been fortunate to have traveled to several cities in US, Europe, Australia and Asia. Personally I love making new friends, engaging in diversity and learning about new cultures. I am honored to live in such a multi-cultural, vibrant and enjoyable city and I am extremely excited to have the opportunity to host guests from all over the world.

So come down - have a great trip and I look forward to being your host!

properties.notes: •Check-in time: 1430 hours •Check-out time: 1130 hours * 24 hours reception. properties.transit: Getting Around. HOP on the Star Ferry to Hong Kong Island, or take the MTR (subway). Want to head over to China and Macau? HOP on the ferry terminal, train, and airport bus stations. They're all a few minutes away.  Shop. Harbor City, Ocean Terminal shopping centres, Sogo department stores, and shops along Nathan Road are all steps away. Hungry? Many superb restaurants of international cookery and flavours nearby. Night Life. HOP Inn is also about action -- we are a short distance to the fun night life, but yet far enough from the noise and bustle at night.

properties.summary: This studio is perfect for anyone on a short business trip or travelling alone. It has everything you need for a comfortable and convenient stay, it is new, clean, with a work space, a bathroom particularly spacious for Hong Kong, and a full kitchen.
properties.space: My place is perfect for anyone on a short business trip or travelling alone. It has everything you need to make your trip comfortable and convenient, whether you stay for a short or a longer time. The bed is new, high and firm, comfortable and of great quality, facing the TV. Perfect when you need to relax after a long day. The workspace is functional and pleasant at the same time. The luminosity is perfect and can be adapted to your needs. It is a pleasure to work there. Don't get trapped in the armchair though, it may be too comfy! The bathroom is exceptionally large for a studio in Hong Kong. The toilet and the shower are completely separate, which is not the case in most studios here. I also love the luminosity in this shower, it is always a great thing to start the day. properties.neighborhood_overview: With its Avenue of Stars, numerous shopping malls, countless restaurants and other hidden gems, Tsim Sha Tsui (TST) is one of the most exciting place to stay in! Whether you like shopping, sightseeing, local and fine dining, there is everything for you here. It is also ideally located between the more western-style island and the more typical (and must-see!) Mongkok.
properties.transit: 2 minutes walk from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR Station (hub), 5 minutes walk from A21 Airport bus stop, 10 minutes walk from Tsim Sha Tsui Ferry Pier, + Many taxis available on this street 24/7.
properties.access: You will have access to the whole studio of course :D (Tip: Go and have a look at the rooftop terrace, it might be interesting!)
properties.interaction: I will remain available all the time during your trip and will do my best to help and guide you if you need. I might not be in HK when you come but I will be very responsive and attentive to your requests, and my friends who stay in the area will be there to help you if needed.
properties.house_rules: . Remember that you are staying at someone's home, not a hotel, so please take care of the apartment as it was your own apartment. . If you want to smoke, please do it in the bathroom, open the windows and turn on the ventilation. . If goods are damaged during your stay and need to be replaced, you will be responsible and will need to repay as follows: HKD2000 for the TV, HKD1500 for the armchair, HKD1000 for the desk, HKD500 for a lamp, HKD500 for a rug, HKD4000 for the bed. . Please turn off the air conditioner and the lights every time you leave the studio. . Be respectful of the place and quiet as I let my apartment to travelers when I am away, and I don't want to have any trouble with the neighborhood. . Before having a shower, you need to turn on the water heater (next to the light switch), then wait 10 min.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Centrally located (1-minute walk to MTR (exit B1)) in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Sunrise Boutique Hotel features easy access to the city’s attractions (opposite Kowloon Park, Kowloon Mosque, next to The One shopping mall) and many areas of interest such as the famous Victoria Harbor, Avenue of Stars, Clock Tower and Various Shopping Centers just to name a few. For meals guests can find a wide array of international cuisines in Tsim Sha Tsui as well as incredibly tasty local options.
properties.notes: Check in time: 2.30 pm to 11 pm. Check out time: 12 noon No smoking and no pets, please!
properties.transit: Tsim Sha Tsui MTR subway station is only a 1-minute walk away. Local bus stop is also directly opposite the hotel and is a great way of getting around. Airport bus stop is conveniently located under the hotel.
properties.access: 24 hours hot shower, Air-conditioned Flat TV Free Wi-Fi Kettle Hair Dryer Iron Ironing Board Comfort Towel & Linen Free body wash & shampoo Daily housekeeping service
properties.interaction: Transport : 1. From Airport take the A21 airport bus and alight at Cameron Road stop, it's right outside our apartment building! 2. By MTR, alight at Tsim Sha Tsui station and take the B1 exit, 1-minute walk to the apartement building! 3. By Taxi from anywhere, tell the driver Comfort Building, Tsim Sha Tsui, you can alight right outside our apartment building!

properties.host_about:
Hi everyone!

My name is Mike and I am an expatriate living in Hong Kong. I am a fun loving and easy going person who loves to read, play badminton and travel. I have been fortunate to have traveled to several cities in US, Europe, Australia and Asia. Personally I love making new friends, engaging in diversity and learning about new cultures. I am honored to live in such a multi-cultural, vibrant and enjoyable city and I am extremely excited to have the opportunity to host guests from all over the world.

So come down - have a great trip and I look forward to being your host!

properties.name: Hop Inn - Single (Bunk) (Hankow)
properties.summary: En-suite private room:  - Single with Bunk bed - 24 hrs hot shower  - Fresh linen  - Shampoo & soap  - Free high speed Wifi  - Free cold / hot drinking water  - Microwave & fridge * Monthly rental starting from HK5900 ( per 30 nights)
properties.space: HOP INN is a cozy hostel designed for independent travelers from around the world. Each living space is unique in its own way - Each was designed and transformed into living artwork by different talented local artists or illustrators. HOP INN is more than just lodging. Whether you are travelling with only one backpack or a couple of suitcases, we are pleased to offer you a comfy, modern and clean, yet affordable, living space while offering friendly and helpful service. Operating at 3 locations - Hop Inn on Hankow // Hop Inn on Carnarvon // Hop Inn on Mody.  All 3 hostels are conveniently located in Tsim Sha Tsui - 5 mins walk apart from each other surrounding TST metro station (within 3 mins walk).  We look forward to seeing you very soon, happy travel!
properties.description: En-suite private room:  - Single with Bunk bed - 24 hrs hot shower  - Fresh linen  - Shampoo & soap  - Free high speed Wifi  - Free cold / hot drinking water  - Microwave & fridge * Monthly rental starting from HK5900 ( per 30 nights) HOP INN is a cozy hostel designed for independent travelers from around the world. Each living space is unique in its own way - Each was designed and transformed into living artwork by different talented local artists or illustrators. HOP INN is more than just lodging. Whether you are travelling with only one backpack or a couple of suitcases, we are pleased to offer you a comfy, modern and clean, yet affordable, living space while offering friendly and helpful service. Operating at 3 locations - Hop Inn on Hankow // Hop Inn on Carnarvon // Hop Inn on Mody.  All 3 hostels are conveniently located in Tsim Sha Tsui - 5 mins walk apart from each other surrounding TST metro station (within 3 mins walk).  We look forward to seeing you very soon, happy travel!
properties.notes: **PLEASE NOTE: Our hostel do not take reservation by room style in order to fulfill the demand of most guests. We do guarantee 100% that you'll be given the room type that you reserved. Thank you very much for your kind understanding.**
properties.transit: HOP on the Star Ferry to Hong Kong Island, or take the MTR (subway). Want to head over to China and Macau? HOP on the ferry terminal, train, and airport bus stations. They're all a few minutes away. Shop. Harbor City, Ocean Terminal shopping centres, Sogo department stores, and shops along Nathan Road are all steps away. Hungry? Many superb restaurants of international cookery and flavours nearby. Night Life. HOP Inn is also about action -- we are a short distance to the fun night life, but yet far enough from the noise and bustle at night.

properties.host_about:
Hi everyone!

My name is Mike and I am an expatriate living in Hong Kong. I am a fun loving and easy going person who loves to read, play badminton and travel. I have been fortunate to have traveled to several cities in US, Europe, Australia and Asia. Personally I love making new friends, engaging in diversity and learning about new cultures. I am honored to live in such a multi-cultural, vibrant and enjoyable city and I am extremely excited to have the opportunity to host guests from all over the world.

So come down - have a great trip and I look forward to being your host!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Hop Inn is located in the heart of the historical Tsim Sha Tsui district, nestled among five star hotels. A three-minute walk takes you to the breathtaking Victoria Harbor, the monumental Cultural Centre and the Art Museum.
properties.notes: •Check-in time: 1430 hours •Check-out time: 1130 hours * 24 hours reception. No worries to check in / out even mid night =) •Half-day room rate will be charged for late check out. •To conserve earth’s resources, bed linens & towels will be changed on guest request only. Please tell the front desk if you wish to have your bed linens or towels changed. •All provided items are intended for the use in your room & are belongings of HOP INN. Please do not take them away.
properties.transit: Getting Around. HOP on the Star Ferry to Hong Kong Island, or take the MTR (subway). Want to head over to China and Macau? HOP on the ferry terminal, train, and airport bus stations. They're all a few minutes away.  Shop. Harbor City, Ocean Terminal shopping centres, Sogo department stores, and shops along Nathan Road are all steps away. Hungry? Many superb restaurants of international cookery and flavours nearby. Night Life. HOP Inn is also about action -- we are a short distance to the fun night life, but yet far enough from the noise and bustle at night.
properties.house_rules: •No visitors after 11pm. •Child Policy:  Private room - Children 3 years old or under are free of charge if he/she doesn't require extra bed space.  Children over 3 years old will be charged as an adult. •No extra guest. We reserved the right to refuse extra guest staying in the room unless mutual agreement has been arranged otherwise. Violator will be subject to eviction from the property without refund. •Strictly NO SMOKING policy in all area of the premise.

properties.notes: •Check-in time: 1430 hours •Check-out time: 1130 hours * 24 hours reception. My favorite movie is "Titanic" I like to meet people from all over the world through Airbnb and have had wonderful experiences and friendships through Airbnb.! If you are budget traveler or in a tight budget , pls tell me and maybe I can offer you a good rate to stay!
